Module idatt1002_2021_k1_08
Package idatt1002_2021_k1_08.datamodel

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
idatt1002_2021_k1_08.datamodel.FileHandler
public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Class that deals with all things file related The files are data consisted of serialized list of objects into byte data

  • Field Details

    • FILE_PATH_CATEGORY

      private static final java.io.File FILE_PATH_CATEGORY
      The constant FILE_PATH_CATEGORY is a .ser extension file directly created inside directory resources/../DataStorage upon launch To avoid a read from wrong files we do not allow user to search and choose files themself. FILE_PATH_CATEGORY the file for categories

    • FILE_PATH

      private static final java.io.File FILE_PATH
      The constant FILE_PATH is a .ser extension file directly created inside directory resources/../DataStorage upon launch To avoid a read from wrong files we do not allow user to search and choose files themself. FILE_PATH the file for tasks

    • obTasks

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Task> obTasks
      Creates an Observable list to contain all tasks. Needs to be observable to implement listeners for easier updates in list view obTasks the list that contains task objects

    • categories

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> categories
      The list of category strings must be Observable list to implement listeners to update categories the list of categories

    • storeData

      public void storeData() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      StoreData runs when application is closed. Stores all data regarding tasks and categories into separate files with a .ser extension Files stored in src/resources/idatt1002_2021_k1_08/DataStorage
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - caused by java.io package utilities
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - caused by utilities used inside serialize methods

    • loadData

      public void loadData() throws java.io.IOException
      LoadData is run when init method from application is run. Method gets data from files inside DataStorage folder. Reads deserialize and adds all objects and/or Strings to each observableList
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - cause by java.io package utilities

      Parameters:

    • deserializeCategory

      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> deserializeCategory() throws java.io.IOException
      Returns:
      category1 is an ArrayList containing each object of category previously stored inside CategoryStrings.ser category1 = (ArrayList) ois.readObject(); This line warns us of an unchecked cast, But since we know that each item of category inside category1 is a object with only string content, and the need for it to be sorted is not there we can ignore this warning.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - caused by java.io package utilities
